location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Key Map to Boundaries of Military Report Areas in Mesopotamia'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in Colour on PaperDimensions: 300 x 270 mm

mods.abstract: This map shows the boundaries of the ten military areas of Iraq from 1922. The map also indicates some hydrology, major settlements and the boundary with Persia at the time.
